# Terms by Chapter

## Chapter 1 Terms

```{r}
library(pander)
section1.1 <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Section1-1.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table1.1 <- cbind(section1.1[1], section1.1[2])
names(table1.1) <- c("Term", "Description")
pander(table1.1)
```
